text: ۞لَيۡسُواْ سَوَآءٗۗ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُمَّةٞ قَآئِمَةٞ يَتۡلُونَ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَهُمۡ يَسۡجُدُونَ

translation.en: They are not [all] the same; among the People of the Scripture is a community standing [in obedience], reciting the verses of Allah during periods of the night and prostrating [in prayer]
translation.id: Mereka itu tidak (seluruhnya) sama. Di antara Ahli Kitab ada golongan yang jujur,138) mereka membaca ayat-ayat Allah pada malam hari, dan mereka (juga) bersujud (salat)
